author: James Joyce
text: Reply from Board of Education to say that they can do nothing in the matter. Charlie, I regret to say, stands in danger of arrest just at present. Weather frightful. Am surprised that no letter has been forwarded from Galway from you. I bought some fine photographs for Sordina and also a copy of Toneâ€™s Autobiography (7/8). I think I did right as he was very kind to me. Am sending them to him. Charlie admits that he lost the post in the telephone through his own fault. Jim
